1.12.2.0.2.2:
Cadiboo: Optimised imports
Cadiboo: Fixed big bug with reflection (Using Float.class instead of float.class)
Cadiboo: Fixed big bug with reflection (Invoking the wrong method handle)
1.12.2.0.2.1: Cadiboo: Maven and Gradle don't like spaces in filenames, so now we use - instead
1.12.2.0.2.0:
Cadiboo: Added Signature replacement to gradle
Cadiboo: Added Jar-signing code
Cadiboo: Fixed update JSON
Cadiboo: Made mod "disableable"
Cadiboo: Added Jar-signing gradle stuff
Cadiboo: Added event Types
Cadiboo: Added utility methods to invoke inaccessible methods
Cadiboo: Rename class transformers to better reflect their purpose
Cadiboo: Cleaned up code
1.12.2.0.1.1:
Cadiboo: Fixed 2 of the events not getting pre-loaded
Cadiboo: Cleaned build
1.12.2.0.1.0:
Cadiboo: Add semver to build.gradle
Cadiboo: Add debug JVM argument thing (very useful)
Cadiboo: 	Add -DdebugEverything=true to your JVM arguments in your launch profile to activate
Cadiboo: Minify the name of one of the ClassTransformer loggers
Cadiboo: Rename LoadingPlugin
Cadiboo: Automation of version (only need to change it in the build.gradle file now)
Cadiboo: Repackage to reflect web presence (cadiboo -> io.github.cadiboo)
Cadiboo: Added final to some classes that needed it
Cadiboo: Moved the BetterFoliage Compatibility EventSubscriber to its own package (compatibility)
Cadiboo: Remove Stringly typed instantiation of the BetterFoliage Compatibility EventSubscriber (apparently it wasn't necessary)
Cadiboo: Spaces -> Tabulations in build.gradle
Cadiboo: Added classes to .gitignore
Cadiboo: Compatible with Optifine HD_U_E3 on Forge #2795
Cadiboo: Remove decompiled BetterFoliage & Optifine code
1.12.2.1.0.1.0:
Cadiboo: Refactoring & made Layer and Type events cancellable (causes minor mod version increment)
Cadiboo: Modified LICENSE
1.12.2.1.0.0.0: Cadiboo: All bugs fixed (I think), First release
1.12.2.0.0.0.0-alpha16:
Cadiboo: Fix #2 completely (lang also works now)
Cadiboo: Refactoring & code style
1.12.2.0.0.0.0-alpha15:
Cadiboo: Config
Cadiboo: Refactoring
Cadiboo: added option to force reload chunks on config change
Cadiboo: added BlockPosM getter in Optifine events
1.12.2.0.0.0.0-alpha14: Cadiboo: Fix stupid copy pasta bug
1.12.2.0.0.0.0-alpha12: Cadiboo: Everything works perfectly except the config :/ - It works in the dev environment though!
1.12.2.0.0.0.0-alpha9: Cadiboo: Redid a bunch of the ASM & obfuscation stuff
1.12.2.0.0.0.0-alpha7:
Cadiboo: Actually works in non-dev environment
Cadiboo: changed "deobfuscated" names
Cadiboo: actually targets the right method
Cadiboo: actually injects properly
Cadiboo: fixed typo where Optifine hook was posting non-Optifine event
1.12.2.0.0.0.0-alpha6: Cadiboo: Now doesn't crash outside a dev environment
1.12.2.0.0.0.0-alpha4: Cadiboo: Added RebuildChunkPostEvent hook and started on Optifine compatibility
1.12.2.0.0.0.0-alpha3: Cadiboo: Re-wrote mod to use proper ASM, This version doesn't have any compatibility features.
1.12.2.0.0.0.0-alpha2: Cadiboo: Small bug fixes to alpha1
1.12.2.0.0.0.0-alpha1: Cadiboo: Initial Release, Replaces RenderChunk#rebuildChunk with code redirecting to our own method. No compatibility with any other core mods who modify RenderChunk#rebuildChunk.
